description.value:
Trigger Your turn begins.

Your hands flow unbidden, tracing runes as if by purest instinct. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} until the end of your turn and can use the extra action only to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.impossible-playtest-actions.Item.wamCImlN6xwUHzyk]{Trace Runes}, including to supply 1 action if using the 2-action version of Trace Rune. Absorbed in the act of creation, you can't use any invocation actions this turn.
